mapper.sql: APPLYINST_CANCEL_ID applyinstCancelId, APPLYINST_ID applyinstId, PROJ_INFO_ID projInfoId, APPINST_ID appinstId, ATT_ID attId, APPLY_REASON applyReason, APPLY_USER_ID applyUserId, APPLY_USER_NAME applyUserName, APPLY_USER_IDNUMBER applyUserIdnumber, APPLY_USER_PHONE applyUserPhone, APPLY_TIME applyTime, HANDLE_OPINION handleOpinion, HANDLE_ORG_ID handleOrgId, HANDLE_ORG_NAME handleOrgName, HANDLE_USER_ID handleUserId, HANDLE_USER_NAME handleUserName, HANDLE_SIGN_TIME handleSignTime, HANDLE_END_TIME handleEndTime, CANCEL_STATE cancelState, CANCEL_MEMO cancelMemo, IS_DELETED isDeleted, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime, MODIFIER modifier, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId, IS_SUSPENDED_BEFORE isSuspendedBefore, SIGN_STATE signState

aac.APPLYINST_CANCEL_ID applyinstCancelId, aac.APPLYINST_ID applyinstId, aac.PROJ_INFO_ID projInfoId, aac.APPINST_ID appinstId, aac.ATT_ID attId, aac.APPLY_REASON applyReason, aac.APPLY_USER_ID applyUserId, aac.APPLY_USER_NAME applyUserName, aac.APPLY_USER_IDNUMBER applyUserIdnumber, aac.APPLY_USER_PHONE applyUserPhone, aac.APPLY_TIME applyTime, aac.HANDLE_OPINION handleOpinion, aac.HANDLE_ORG_ID handleOrgId, aac.HANDLE_ORG_NAME handleOrgName, aac.HANDLE_USER_ID handleUserId, aac.HANDLE_USER_NAME handleUserName, aac.HANDLE_SIGN_TIME handleSignTime, aac.HANDLE_END_TIME handleEndTime, aac.CANCEL_STATE cancelState, aac.CANCEL_MEMO cancelMemo, aac.IS_DELETED isDeleted, aac.CREATER creater, aac.CREATE_TIME createTime, aac.MODIFIER modifier, aac.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, aac.ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId, aac.IS_SUSPENDED_BEFORE isSuspendedBefore, aac.SIGN_STATE signState
mapper.select:
select
from AEA_HI_APPLYINST_CANCEL where APPLYINST_CANCEL_ID = #{id} AND IS_DELETED = '0'

select
from AEA_HI_APPLYINST_CANCEL aac inner join aea_hi_item_cancel ahic on ahic.APPLYINST_CANCEL_ID = aac.APPLYINST_CANCEL_ID and ahic.ITEMINST_ID = #{iteminstId} where aac.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} order by aac.CREATE_TIME desc
mapper.update:
update AEA_HI_APPLYINST_CANCEL
APPLYINST_CANCEL_ID = #{applyinstCancelId},
APPLYINST_ID = #{applyinstId},
PROJ_INFO_ID = #{projInfoId},
APPINST_ID = #{appinstId},
ATT_ID = #{attId},
APPLY_REASON = #{applyReason},
APPLY_USER_ID = #{applyUserId},
APPLY_USER_NAME = #{applyUserName},
APPLY_USER_IDNUMBER = #{applyUserIdnumber},
APPLY_USER_PHONE = #{applyUserPhone},
APPLY_TIME = #{applyTime},
HANDLE_OPINION = #{handleOpinion},
HANDLE_ORG_ID = #{handleOrgId},
HANDLE_ORG_NAME = #{handleOrgName},
HANDLE_USER_ID = #{handleUserId},
HANDLE_USER_NAME = #{handleUserName},
HANDLE_SIGN_TIME = #{handleSignTime},
HANDLE_END_TIME = #{handleEndTime},
CANCEL_STATE = #{cancelState},
CANCEL_MEMO = #{cancelMemo},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
IS_SUSPENDED_BEFORE = #{isSuspendedBefore},
SIGN_STATE = #{signState}
where APPLYINST_CANCEL_ID = #{applyinstCancelId}
